channel.title: Another server help! lol!
channel.description:
ok after this..i dont need any more help :) how do i change an item's price..and how do i create a shop, and how do i make an object only for donators :) like when a non doner tries to wear it..then it says they must be a doner to wear that item ..
thnx

@danimaster wrote:

mm thnx ok but i right now mostly want to kno how to change an item’s price =p

item.title: Another server help! lol!
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

shop is in shop.cfg, you have to open that up using notepad. But donators i’m not sure on because for like an item you dont want people to wear you usually do like playerrights <3 but donators, you’ll have to make like a member, like set playerrights as 5, and make a command such as this. example: (not sure if this will work or not)

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“givedonator”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 5;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a donator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

replace username with your username! =)

Read full topic
